adobe.conditions: Cancel within 14 days of purchase for full refund

amazon_music_unlimited.conditions: Digital subscription; no physical return process.

amazon_prime.conditions: Full refund within 3 days if no Prime benefits used

apple_app_store.conditions: Request via Report a Problem within 14 days

apple_arcade.conditions: Digital subscription; no physical return process.

apple_music.conditions: All sales final per Apple Media Services terms

apple_tv_plus.conditions: All sales final per Apple Media Services terms

audible.conditions: Membership fees non-refundable; individual audiobook returns handled separately

bitwarden.conditions: Contact support within 30 days of subscription creation

calm.conditions: Yearly premium purchased via calm.com; within 30 days

canva.conditions: No refunds per terms of use

chatgpt_plus.conditions: Non-refundable; 14-day window for accidental purchases only

claude_pro.conditions: Non-refundable except as required by law

crunchyroll.conditions: Non-refundable; digital memberships excluded from returns

deezer.conditions: Non-refundable in US; 14-day window if service completely unused

discord_nitro.conditions: Digital subscription; no physical return process.

disney_plus.conditions: No refunds; access continues until end of billing cycle

doordash_dashpass.conditions: Non-refundable; benefits continue until end of billing cycle

dropbox_us.conditions: No refunds per terms; files retained 90 days after downgrade

espn_plus.conditions: Digital subscription; no physical return process.

evernote.conditions: 20-day window for monthly; 60-day window for annual subscriptions

figma.conditions: Non-refundable; exceptions only for price changes or service discontinuation

github_pro.conditions: No standard return policy; case-by-case via support

google_one.conditions: Digital membership; no physical return process.

google_play.conditions: Request via Google Play within 48 hours of purchase

hellofresh.conditions: Non-refundable; case-by-case for quality or delivery issues only

hinge.conditions: Non-refundable in US; 3-day right-to-cancel in some states

icloud_plus.conditions: Request via Apple Report a Problem within 14 days

instacart_plus.conditions: Annual plan refundable within 5 days if no orders placed

kindle_unlimited.conditions: Digital subscription; no physical return process.

linkedin_premium.conditions: Refundable within 7 days if premium features unused

masterclass.conditions: 30-day satisfaction guarantee; first-time direct purchases only

microsoft_365.conditions: Full refund within 30 days; prorated refund possible after

midjourney.conditions: Refund only if under 20 GPU minutes used lifetime; effectively non-returnable

netflix.conditions: No refunds; account saved for 10 months after cancellation

noom.conditions: 14-day window from first charge; renewals non-refundable

playstation_plus.conditions: 14-day cancellation window; pro-rated refund minus value of services used

proton.conditions: Digital subscription; no physical return process.

ring_protect.conditions: Digital service plan; no physical return process.

shutterstock.conditions: Non-refundable; early termination fee on annual plans

slack.conditions: No cash refund; Fair Billing Policy provides prorated credit for unused time

spotify.conditions: No refunds; reverts to free tier on cancellation

squarespace.conditions: 14-day money-back guarantee for new annual website plans; first payment only

strava.conditions: 14-day full refund from date of purchase

tinder.conditions: Non-refundable in US; 14-day window EU only

todoist.conditions: 30-day refund window for yearly plans; monthly non-refundable

uber_one.conditions: Digital membership; no physical return process.

walmart_plus.conditions: Non-refundable; benefits continue until end of billing cycle

wix.conditions: 14-day money-back guarantee for new Premium/Studio plans

youtube_premium.conditions: No refunds for current billing period

youtube_tv.conditions: Digital subscription; no physical return process.

dashlane.conditions: 30-day money-back guarantee for new direct subscriptions.

lastpass.conditions: Refunds may be available within 30 days for new paid subscriptions.

keeper.conditions: Refunds may be requested within 30 days of purchase.

fitbit_premium.conditions: Subscription refunds depend on the purchase channel and platform policies.

myfitnesspal_premium.conditions: Subscription charges are generally non-refundable except where required by law.

weightwatchers.conditions: Refund availability depends on selected plan and commitment terms.

siriusxm.conditions: Subscription fees are generally non-refundable after billing.

patreon.conditions: Membership payments are generally non-refundable and creator-specific.

roblox_premium.conditions: Digital subscription charges are generally non-refundable after billing.

ea_play.conditions: Digital subscription charges are generally non-refundable after billing.

ubisoft_plus.conditions: Digital subscription charges are generally non-refundable after billing.

nfl_plus.conditions: Subscription fees are generally non-refundable after billing.

mlb_tv.conditions: Subscription fees are generally non-refundable after billing.
